Uses of Package
parkingRobot

  • Packages that use parkingRobot 
    Package Description
    parkingRobot  
    parkingRobot.hsamr0  
  • Classes in parkingRobot used by parkingRobot 
    Class and Description
    IControl.ControlMode
    The predefined control modes
    INavigation.ParkingSlot
    contains all necessary information about one parking slot.
    INavigation.ParkingSlot.ParkingSlotStatus
    states the parking slot can be in
    INxtHmi.Mode
    Enumeration holding the robot driving modes.
    IPerception.AngleDifferenceMeasurement
    bundles both values relevant for measuring an angle difference by an encoder sensor
    IPerception.EncoderSensor
    supports processing of encoder sensor by recording the angle difference since last call of getEncoderMeasurement and the corresponding time interval.
    IPerception.OdoDifferenceMeasurement
    bundles all values relevant for measuring an shift difference by an Odometry sensor
    IPerception.OdoSensor
    supports processing of the Mouse-odometrysensor by recording the Shift in U-and V-direction since last call of getOdoMeasurement and the corresponding time interval.
  • Classes in parkingRobot used by parkingRobot.hsamr0 
    Class and Description
    IControl
    interface for the main module 'Control', providing methods for executing the algorithms to control the robot according to different modes which is set by guidance.
    IControl.ControlMode
    The predefined control modes
    INavigation
    interface for the main module 'Navigation', providing methods for estimation of the robot position, its heading angle and information about detected parking slots.
    INavigation.ParkingSlot
    contains all necessary information about one parking slot.
    INxtHmi
    Robot-side human machine interface module.
    INxtHmi.Mode
    Enumeration holding the robot driving modes.
    IPerception
    interface for the main module 'Perception', providing methods for getting all measuring data from the robot sensors
    IPerception.EncoderSensor
    supports processing of encoder sensor by recording the angle difference since last call of getEncoderMeasurement and the corresponding time interval.
    IPerception.OdoSensor
    supports processing of the Mouse-odometrysensor by recording the Shift in U-and V-direction since last call of getOdoMeasurement and the corresponding time interval.
